durable.translation[0].definitions[0].de: staying in good condition for a long time, even if used a lot
durable.translation[1].definitions[0].de: if something is durable, it lasts a long time, even if it is used a lot
durable.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: These materials are used in televisions to make them more durable and more fire-resistant.
durable.translation[1].definitions[1].de: continuing, or continuing to be successful, for a long time
durable.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: The U.S. economy is a durable beast.
